text.text_translated:
Before, I worked five days a week.
Then I had my children.
I wanted to spend more time with them before they go to school.
So I talked to my boss.
We agreed that I can work three days a week.
This meant I got much less money.
But now I see a problem.
My amount of work is the same as before.
I do five days of work in only three days.
But I get paid much less for it.
